metadata.title: CVE-2021-4090 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An out-of-bounds (OOB) memory write flaw was found in the NFSD in the Linuxkernel. Missing sanity may lead to a write beyond bmval[bmlen-1] innfsd4_decode_bitmap4 in fs/nfsd/nfs4xdr.c. In this flaw, a local attackerwith user privilege may gain access to out-of-bounds memory, leading to asystem integrity and confidentiality threat.
